		<title>SpaceX Dragon cargo capsule splashes down in Pacific Ocean</title>


		<description>CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (Reuters) - A SpaceX Dragon capsule splashed down in the Pacific Ocean on Wednesday carrying about 3,700 pounds (1,680 kg) of experiment results and cargo from the International Space Station, NASA said.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=Wsij6Rz-EIo:4OK-5R6g7OY:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=Wsij6Rz-EIo:4OK-5R6g7OY:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=Wsij6Rz-EIo:4OK-5R6g7OY:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=Wsij6Rz-EIo:4OK-5R6g7OY:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=Wsij6Rz-EIo:4OK-5R6g7OY:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/Wsij6Rz-EIo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/Wsij6Rz-EIo/us-space-spacex-station-idUSKCN0Y21LN</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-space-spacex-station-idUSKCN0Y21LN?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 16:38:29 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-space-spacex-station-idUSKCN0Y21LN?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>'Hyperloop' sled speeds through U.S. desert via electromagnets</title>


		<description>NORTH LAS VEGAS, Nev. (Reuters) - A car-sized sled powered by electromagnets rocketed to more than 100 miles (160 kph) an hour through the Nevada desert on Wednesday in what the Los Angeles company developing the technology said was the first successful test of a futurist transit system called hyperloop.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=SeO2TLeDGqc:uiSwjNDfEUM:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=SeO2TLeDGqc:uiSwjNDfEUM:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=SeO2TLeDGqc:uiSwjNDfEUM:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=SeO2TLeDGqc:uiSwjNDfEUM:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=SeO2TLeDGqc:uiSwjNDfEUM:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/SeO2TLeDGqc" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/SeO2TLeDGqc/us-usa-hyperloop-test-idUSKCN0Y300Z</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-hyperloop-test-idUSKCN0Y300Z?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 00:39:45 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-hyperloop-test-idUSKCN0Y300Z?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>A breath test for malaria</title>


		<description>ST. LOUIS, (Reuters) - Diagnosing malaria may soon be as easy taking a simple breath test, according to researchers.  <div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=_t7QBuqLPb0:mirFQeNxywA:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=_t7QBuqLPb0:mirFQeNxywA:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=_t7QBuqLPb0:mirFQeNxywA:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=_t7QBuqLPb0:mirFQeNxywA:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=_t7QBuqLPb0:mirFQeNxywA:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/_t7QBuqLPb0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/_t7QBuqLPb0/us-health-malaria-breath-test-idUSKCN0Y22DI</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-malaria-breath-test-idUSKCN0Y22DI?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>

		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-malaria-breath-test-idUSKCN0Y22DI?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Ancient lava bubbles reveal conditions on primordial Earth</title>


		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Tiny bubbles that formed inside volcanic rock 2.7 billion years ago are providing big insights into the conditions on primordial Earth.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=otF7YBRsAyk:Ja-Gu7w1teY:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=otF7YBRsAyk:Ja-Gu7w1teY:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=otF7YBRsAyk:Ja-Gu7w1teY:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=otF7YBRsAyk:Ja-Gu7w1teY:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=otF7YBRsAyk:Ja-Gu7w1teY:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/otF7YBRsAyk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/otF7YBRsAyk/us-science-bubbles-idUSKCN0Y02EK</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-bubbles-idUSKCN0Y02EK?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 16:46:02 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-bubbles-idUSKCN0Y02EK?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Record 1,284 planets added to list of worlds beyond solar system</title>


		<description>CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (Reuters) - Astronomers have discovered 1,284 more planets beyond our solar system, with nine possibly in orbits suitable for surface water that could bolster the prospects of supporting life, scientists said on Tuesday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=zMqNREWzwh0:bHdraSGiSSg:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=zMqNREWzwh0:bHdraSGiSSg:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=zMqNREWzwh0:bHdraSGiSSg:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=zMqNREWzwh0:bHdraSGiSSg:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=zMqNREWzwh0:bHdraSGiSSg:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/zMqNREWzwh0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/zMqNREWzwh0/us-space-kepler-idUSKCN0Y12NP</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-space-kepler-idUSKCN0Y12NP?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 11:23:47 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-space-kepler-idUSKCN0Y12NP?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Earthlings watch as tiny Mercury sails past the sun</title>


		<description>CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (Reuters) - Tiny Mercury, the solar system's innermost planet, sailed across the face of the sun on Monday, a celestial dance that occurs about once every decade as Earth and its smaller neighboring planet align in space.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=DFkaqW6c-mo:Wz1maChydCM:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=DFkaqW6c-mo:Wz1maChydCM:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=DFkaqW6c-mo:Wz1maChydCM:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=DFkaqW6c-mo:Wz1maChydCM:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=DFkaqW6c-mo:Wz1maChydCM:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/DFkaqW6c-mo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/DFkaqW6c-mo/us-space-mercury-idUSKCN0Y022Z</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-space-mercury-idUSKCN0Y022Z?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 14:21:44 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-space-mercury-idUSKCN0Y022Z?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Scientists peel back the carrot's genetic secrets</title>


		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Scientists have gotten to the root of the carrot, genetically speaking.   <div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=iGI-8s2zlDI:I4otlTGjOkE:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=iGI-8s2zlDI:I4otlTGjOkE:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=iGI-8s2zlDI:I4otlTGjOkE:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=iGI-8s2zlDI:I4otlTGjOkE:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=iGI-8s2zlDI:I4otlTGjOkE:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/iGI-8s2zlDI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/iGI-8s2zlDI/us-science-carrots-idUSKCN0Y01QP</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-carrots-idUSKCN0Y01QP?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>

		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-carrots-idUSKCN0Y01QP?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Nailed it: scientists describe weird ancient hammerhead reptile</title>


		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - It was a creature so outlandish that scientists say it reminds them of the fanciful beasts conjured up by Dr. Seuss. But would the famous children's book author have thought up a marine reptile with a hammerhead snout it used to snack on algae?<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=gsW1PQ34Wbw:gJI4zlqkMOI:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=gsW1PQ34Wbw:gJI4zlqkMOI:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=gsW1PQ34Wbw:gJI4zlqkMOI:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=gsW1PQ34Wbw:gJI4zlqkMOI:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=gsW1PQ34Wbw:gJI4zlqkMOI:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/gsW1PQ34Wbw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/gsW1PQ34Wbw/us-science-hammerhead-idUSKCN0XX1XY</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-hammerhead-idUSKCN0XX1XY?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 06 May 2016 14:58:30 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-hammerhead-idUSKCN0XX1XY?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>U.S. traders reject GMO crops that lack global approval</title>


		<description>(Reuters) - Across the U.S. Farm Belt, top grain handlers have banned genetically modified crops that are not approved in all major overseas markets, shaking up a decades-old system that used the world's biggest exporting country as a launchpad for new seeds from companies like Monsanto Co.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=VM-Vi9rlqA0:AgYS2Gz8sHk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=VM-Vi9rlqA0:AgYS2Gz8sHk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=VM-Vi9rlqA0:AgYS2Gz8sHk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=VM-Vi9rlqA0:AgYS2Gz8sHk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=VM-Vi9rlqA0:AgYS2Gz8sHk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/VM-Vi9rlqA0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/VM-Vi9rlqA0/us-usa-gmo-crops-idUSKCN0XX2AV</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-gmo-crops-idUSKCN0XX2AV?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 06 May 2016 17:23:34 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-gmo-crops-idUSKCN0XX2AV?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Primate fate: Chinese fossils illuminate key evolutionary period</title>


		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A treasure trove of fossils of six furry critters that inhabited the trees of southern China 34 million years ago is providing a deeper understanding of a pivotal moment in the evolution of primates, the group that eventually gave rise to people.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=K5qaa3lCUPM:hYVs1k_6Ig0:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=K5qaa3lCUPM:hYVs1k_6Ig0:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=K5qaa3lCUPM:hYVs1k_6Ig0:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?a=K5qaa3lCUPM:hYVs1k_6Ig0:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/scienceNews?i=K5qaa3lCUPM:hYVs1k_6Ig0:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~4/K5qaa3lCUPM" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/scienceNews/~3/K5qaa3lCUPM/us-science-primates-idUSKCN0XW1YB</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-science-primates-idUSKCN0XW1YB?feedType=RSS&feedName=scienceNews</guid>
        <category>scienceNews</category>
